attributes.action: Dismiss and Charge all MPs who have abused the Expenses Claims perk for Treason against the People of this Nation!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for all Members of Parliment who have abused the Expenses Claims Perk, including members of the current Cabinet, to be dismissed from Government Service, effective immediately.

Also, all those who have abused, or have been acused of abusing the Expenses Perk, are to be brought before a Court of Law and tried for Treason against the People of the United Kingdom.

No one is above the law, and I ask all Britons who believe that this corruption should be punished to sign this petition.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
